contribute

Contact us via this form and identify how you would like to contribute. Everyone who contributes to this repository will be acknowledged on the collaborators page. You can also contribute via a pull request in Github.

tasks

  • extract data from score PDF files (see corpus 1 spreadsheet)
  • correct extracted data (against original score PDFs)
  • encode data in Music XML or MEI formats
  • provide suggestions for compositions to add to corpus 2

Rebalancing the Music Canon

  • Rebalancing the Music Canon
  • BCDigSchol

This is a website for the Rebalancing the music canon repository of encoded music data.
